agentAbility.name: Shock and Awe
agentAbility.description: Chopper calls in a favor from his friend in the Air Force: a B-52 bomber flies over and drops its payload on the indicated point.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Active Protection System
tankAbilities.description: Active Protection System protects the tank and nearby allies. Like a front-facing shield, the APS intercepts incoming enemy shells and allows the vehicle and allies to cross open ground while active.

tankAbilities.name: Gatling Gun
tankAbilities.description: Switch fire mode to the Gatling machine gun on top of the tank to unleash a barrage of small-caliber rounds to overwhelm lightly armored targets.
